name: spidertest
author: Allan Boyd <millionyearsold@gmail.com>
description: A test framework for verifying links and HTTP request and their responses with automated test generation.

scripts.test: ./node_modules/jshint/bin/hint lib/errors.js lib/Reporter.js lib/spider.js  lib/spiderOptions.js lib/spiderTest.js lib/suiteManager.js lib/reporters/ConsoleReporter.js lib/reporters/JUnitReporter.js test/testSpider.js test/testSuiteManager.js test/testSpiderTest.js && ./node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit test/testSpider.js test/testSuiteManager.js test/testSpiderTest.js
